LanguageData.AlertNeedsTurbineDesc: A reactor needs to be connected to a turbine, failure to do so may result in overheating and meltdown
LanguageData.AlertNeedsCoolingDesc: A turbine needs to be connected to a cooling system, failure to do so may result in overheating and meltdown
LanguageData.AlertCoreMeltDesc: A reactor is suffering a core melt incident, evacuate immediately
LanguageData.AlertCoreOverheatDesc: A reactor is being damaged due to overheating
LanguageData.AlertCrackedDesc: Stress from running the core at high temperatures for a long period of time has caused the core to crack, it will need to be deconstructed and rebuilt or it will continue to emit lethal radiation, produce less power and damage the fuel rods.
LanguageData.cycleScreensDesc: Monitor all reactors on this network
LanguageData.RailgunBarrageDesc: Fire all railguns at an area
LanguageData.critCommandLowerRangeDesc: Reduce the maximum range, reduces pulse size
LanguageData.critCommandRaiseRangeDesc: Increase the maximum range, increases pulse size
LanguageData.critCommandLowerDmgDesc: Reduce the maximum per shot, reduces pulse size
LanguageData.critCommandRaiseDmgDesc: Increase the damage per shot, increases pulse size
LanguageData.critCommandLaunchICBMDesc: Launch the ICBM at a target on this Rimworld
LanguageData.criticbmAttack: The enemy faction {0} are preparing to launch an ICBM attack from a nearby base, you have {1} days before launch.
LanguageData.critBombDetFac: The bomb detonated and {0} has been destroyed
LanguageData.MessageRailgunNeedsMap: Map not generated, send colonists to scout
LanguageData.NeedsRiver: Needs to be placed on river lake or ocean
LanguageData.critscramDesc: Return temperature and neutron flux to base values, but leaves the core on
LanguageData.critStartupDesc: Starts the core, allowing temperatures and flux levels to rise
LanguageData.critShutdownDesc: Shuts down the core, leaving it powered but cold, for refueling and repairs.
LanguageData.critNoreserveSuit: No unreserved locker with radiation suit
LanguageData.critPlaceOnCore: Must be placed on a molten core
LanguageData.critMoreWater: Requires a larger body of water
LanguageData.critSpentOnly: Set for spent fuel only, none available
LanguageData.critCoreIntegrityDesc: The integrity of this core is so low that it may crack.
LanguageData.TradeShipPriceNeed: Need {0} silver to send trade ship
LanguageData.TradeShipReq: A Rimatomics trade ship has been dispached to your planet.\n\nIt will take 2 days to arrive.
LanguageData.TestFireHELSOnOwnShells: Shoot down our own morter shells for data gathering.
LanguageData.ResearchPriceNeed: Requires {0} Silver near a trade beacon
LanguageData.coreUpgradeFail: Can't upgrade while core is active
LanguageData.powerUpgradeFail: Building must be powered down before upgrading
LanguageData.Conductors: Improves heat conductivity in the core increasing power by 15%
LanguageData.NeutronReflectors: Improves maximum neutron flux rate, increasing power by 25%
LanguageData.Breeder: Converts a thermal reactor into a breeder reactor, which is capable of creating more fuel that it uses
LanguageData.ReactorShielding: Reduces the amount of radiation that can leak from a reactor
LanguageData.ControlRodActuator: Increases the responsiveness of control rods
LanguageData.ObeliskBeamSplitter: Breaks shields while still dealing damage
LanguageData.RimUnlockedDesc:
You open a connection to the probe and a recorded message starts to play

Someone with the slimey demeanour of a used bionics salesman claims to represent a trading faction known as Rimatomics.

As he makes his sales pitch giglebits of data begin flooding into the console, he explains that these are blueprints to construct a Rimatomics research bench which you can use to purchase plans for some of their technology or request trade ships.

Check the Rimatomics tab in the architect menu.
LanguageData.RimatomicsUpdate:
UPDATE!

 Rimatomics custom research has been changed so that it no longer appears in the standard research tab or modded research tabs

If you have loaded a previous save you will need to restart all of your research projects but step progress and purchase history will remain, the steps just need to recheck that their conditions have been met and then you can continue playing as normal

Steam has the latest version with the research overhaul which may in certain situations break saves from previous versions, the last version that was on steam before 9/9/17 was 1.0.5 which can be downloaded from the forum page linked in the description

Sorry for the inconvenience
